    - name: Upload Blazorise
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v1
      with:
        name: Blazorise.zip
        path: ./Source/Blazorise/bin/Release/netstandard2.1/publish/
        
    - name: Upload Blazorise.Components
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v1
      with:
        name: Blazorise.Components.zip, 
        path: ./Source/Extensions/Blazorise.Components/bin/Release/netstandard2.1/publish/

    - name: Upload Blazorise.DataGrid
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v1

        path: ./Source/Extensions/Blazorise.DataGrid/bin/Release/netstandard2.1/publish/
